subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Kessler, a product of Brooklyn’s schoolyards, spent more than half a century in basketball as a player, coach, scout and, most prominently, a camp instructor who molded young athletes.
snippet: Kessler, a product of Brooklyn’s schoolyards, spent more than half a century in basketball as a player, coach, scout and, most prominently, a camp instructor who molded young athletes.
